name: Runciter On Demand
description:
Up for some Philip K. Dick storytelling? Venture into this half-life console simulator. You'll send messages to the sleeping body of Glenn Runciter (your boss), who will have to avoid Jory Miller; an evil entity that goes to the half-life world absorbing others' vital force.

Music and proofreading

Alex McDonald (@a.j.mcd)

Coding and design

G. Carbonell (gcarbonell.com)

The download includes

- Windows version

- Linux version

- HTML5 version

- Godot project and source files (including music)
